mapper.select: select count(*) from inn where member_id=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where member_id=#{memberId} and wishlist_no=#{wishListNo}
delete from book where member_id=#{memberId} and book_no=#{bookNo}
mapper.insert:
select inn_sequence.nextval from dual
insert into INN (inn_no, inn_name, inn_city, inn_area, inn_address, inn_type, inn_acceptable_no, inn_price, inn_info,inn_availability,member_id) values(#{innNo},#{innName},#{innCity},#{innArea},#{innAddress},#{innType}, #{acceptableNo},#{innPrice},#{innInfo},#{innAvailability},#{memberId})
mapper.select: select inn_no, inn_name, inn_city, inn_area, inn_address, inn_type, inn_acceptable_no, inn_price, inn_info,inn_availability,member_id from INN where member_id=#{memberId}
